name: Cladding
Transport
Secure Panels on truck: Ensure panels are separated by using foam blocks , braced and wrapped for protection
Quality Assurance
Inspect Metal panels are free from scratches, dents and cracks and that weep holes are correct as per design required
Check defects with defects to be returned to factory
Install
Set out: Framing and panels to be set out as per architectural design/Engineering and shop drawings
Framing Fixings: All screws/fixings to be installed as per Design/engineer specifications and measurements
Panels to be lifted into place and fixed off to framing As per SWMS and To be installed as per engineering/ design specifications
Install of panels to be checked: Ensure the gauge, number and distance of fixings are as per engineering specifications and defect free
Finish / Install Inspection
Remove protective coating
Damage Check due to other trades and document
Final Clean
All necessary inspections and verifies that the work has been completed and conforms to the contract specification(s).
Site Framed Doors & Windows
Set Out
Confirm with Site Management primary grid lines and RLs
Review drawings and ensure adequate information
Setout location and height of sub framing elements
Subframe
Material is free from damage
Weep holes are in correct location and number
Sisalation paper and/or under flashing and/or tanking is compete to behind sub framing
Sub frame is installed with specified fittings – packing as required
Sub frame is sealed at stop ends, joins, and to structure / weatherproofing line
Sub frame is reviewed, all caulking complete and free from damage
Door / Window Installation
Material is free from damage
Door/window checked for dimension as per shop drawings
Door/window is installed to line and level with equal margin in openings
Seals are installed as per drawings
Specified hardware is installed
Chain winder is restricted to 125mm or less (if applicable)
Operation of door/window is checked
Door/window is sealed to sub frame if applicable
Caulking applied is neat and free from defects
Check all works and confirm free from defect
Completion
Flashings are installed as per the drawings
Area is cleaned and rubbish in bin
All works checked for defects prior to protection application
Protection is installed to reasonable extent unless agreed otherwise with site management this is described as:
Protective tape to window sills and thresholds
Protective tape to door openings
Protective tape to mullions which plaster abuts
Corflute (or similar) covering to windows where significant works are still to be complete in close proximity
Potential risks for damage are discussed with site management to ensure future works are understood

Window Fabrications Pty Ltd personnel responsible for work) has carried out all necessary inspections and verify that the work has been completed and conforms to the contract specification & Australian Standard AS1288 & AS2047.
